H0.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Dwight D. Eisenhower

H1.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Harry S. Truman

H2.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. Richard Nixon

H3.text: Who was the American President when the Berlin Wall was constructed. JFK

A4.text: John F. Kennedy was the President of the United States during the construction of the Berlin Wall.
